00033         if (font != m_wxpainter.GetFont()) {
00034             m_mustLayout = true;
00035             m_wxpainter.SetFont(font);
00036         }
00037     }
00038     void setOutline(bool outline) {
00039         if (m_outline != outline) {
00040             m_mustPaint = true;
00041             m_painter.setOutline(outline);
00042             m_outline = outline;
00043         }
00044     }
00045     wxPoint getCoords(int x, int y) {
00046         return wxPoint(x-m_border, y-m_ascent-m_border);
00047     }
00048     int getWidth() {
00049         if (m_mustLayout) {
00050             layout();
00051         }
00052         return m_w;
00053     }
00054     int getHeight() {

00057         }
00058         return m_h;
00059     }
